name: sarif-to-slack
description: TypeScript library to send results of SARIF file to Slack webhook URL.

scripts.clean:unsafe: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf lib
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --commit-hooks --git-tag-version --message 'chore: bump to version %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --commit-hooks --git-tag-version --message 'chore: bump to version %s'
scripts.version:major: npm version major --commit-hooks --git-tag-version --message 'chore: bump to version %s'
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean

author: Yevhen Fabizhevskyi
